DOC.brief_summary: To establish efficacy Lu AE58054 adjunctive therapy acetylcholinesterase inhibitor ( AChEIs ) symptomatic treatment patient mild-moderate Alzheimer 's disease ( AD ) .
DOC.brief_title: Lu AE58054 Patients With Mild Moderate Alzheimer 's Disease Treated With Acetylcholinesterase Inhibitor
DOC.criteria: The patient knowledgeable reliable caregiver . The patient outpatient . The patient probable AD . The patient mild moderate AD . Stable treatment AChEI . Other inclusion exclusion criterion may apply .
